author: Luca Missaglia
description: A low-low alcohol, light and refreshing aperitivo which delivers the promised flavours of bergamot and coconut.
name: Bergamot & Coconut Cobbler
recipeIngredient: 40 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
